# Digital sign SDK 

## Functions
- getDigitalsignature
- verifyDigitalsignature

## Inputs
1. getDigitalsignature
    - message - message which can be added with signature

2. verifyDigitalsignature
    - message 
    - digital signature
    - public key

## Outputs
1. getDigitalsignature
    - message 
    - digital signature
    - public key

2. verifyDigitalsignature
    - Status
    - Validity
